mapper.select: SELECT b.buy_id, b.user_id, b.auction_id, b.bid_id, b.buy_date, b.buy_state, m.bid_money, m.bid_time, a.auction_author, a.auction_title, a.auction_lot FROM buy_tb b JOIN bid_tb m ON b.bid_id = m.bid_id JOIN auction_tb a ON b.auction_id = a.auction_id WHERE b.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY b.buy_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO buy_tb (buy_id, user_id, auction_id, bid_id, buy_date, buy_state) VALUES (#{buy_id}, #{user_id}, #{auction_id}, #{bid_id}, #{buy_date}, #{buy_state})
